branchCategory.name: HEC-W5, Thermoelectric Chiller, Water Cooled, 140W, 320W
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 140 W, 320 W <LI>Temperature range setting: 10 to 60°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.03°C or better depending on load stability <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 100 ~ 240 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Clear water or 20% ethylene glycol <LI>Standards: CE, UL, RoHS </LI></UL>
